56586.「<pc>！ またまた 会ったのう。\n アストルティアに 知らぬことなし！\n:
Aye, <if_woman>lassie<else>laddie<endif>! We meet again. Ya' know me,
Hollow. The wanderin' sage who's no
stranger to anything Astoltia.

56587.「おぬしも いろいろと 大変じゃったな。\n まさか 迷いの霧の向こうに わしら:
Ya' been through a lot, haven't ye? I had no
idea beyond that thick mist, there was a
second Lendersia we didn't know existed.

56588.「わしが最初に作った 魔法の羅針盤には\n 迷いの霧を抜ける能力しか なかったか:
The first Magic Compass I created was only
able ta' get past the mist. Sorry I didn't
know better, <if_woman>lassie<else>laddie<endif>.

56589.「……じゃが！ グランゼドーラに行けぬと\n 相談を受けた わしは すぐさま調査:
However! When I was told they couldn't arrive
in Gran Zedora, I did more research and gave
the compass a bit more oomph.

56590.「今では 好きなように グランゼドーラへも\n 異世界のココラタの浜辺へも 行け:
Now ya' can go ta' Gran Zedora or to the
other Cocolata Beach as ya' please! Ho ho ho!
I'm a genius if I do say so me'self!

56591.「むう。ノリが悪いのう <pc>。\n ……なに？ わしに 手紙をあずかってきた:
Aye. Somethin' seems to be naggin' at ya'.
What? A letter? Let me see!

56593.「こ こ これは……！\n ルシェンダさまからの手紙……！？: T... t... this is a letter from Lushenda...?!

56594.「お おい！ おぬし！ <pc>！\n ルシェンダさまに 失礼を\n はたらいて:
Oy', <pc>! I hope ya' haven't been
disrespectful ta' her!

56595.「い いや……。こうしている場合ではない。\n <pc>を 手ぶらで帰すわけには:
S-sorry... this ain't the time for that now.
Can't let ya' go back empty handed...
I must finish that research somehow...

56596.「すまんが <pc>。手伝ってくれ！\n ルシェンダさまに お渡しする 研究の仕:
Sorry to ask, but I need yer' help! I need <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0>
Purifying Herbs to finish me research for
Lushenda!

56597.「浄化のハーブは オーグリード大陸の\n オルセコ高地などにいる <%sEV_Q:
Purifying Herbs are said ta' be dropped by
Orc Chieftains in the Ogreed Continent's
Orseco Highlands!

56598.「次は～ アズラン～ アズラン～。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のないよう\n お:
Next stop, Azlan. Please make sure not to
leave any belongings before exiting the train.

56599.「次は～ 王都カミハルムイ～ カミハルムイ～。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のない:
Next stop, Royal City Kamiharmui. Please
make sure not to leave any belongings
before exiting the train.

56600.「次は～ 岳都ガタラ～ ガタラ～。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のないよう\n お:
Next stop, Mount Gatara. Please make sure not
to leave any belongings before exiting the
train.

56601.「次は～ ドルワーム王国～ ドルワーム王国～。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のない:
Next stop, Dolworm Kingdom. Please make sure
not to leave any belongings before exiting
the train.

56602.「次は～ オルフェア～ オルフェア～。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のないよう\n:
Next stop, Orphea. Please make sure not to
leave any belongings before exiting the train.

56603.「次は～ メギストリスの都 メギストリスの都。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のない:

not to leave any belongings before exiting

Next stop, Julet. Please make sure not to
leave any belongings before exiting the train.

56605.「次は～ ヴェリナード城～ ヴェリナード城～。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のない:
Next stop, Verinard Castle. Please make sure
not to leave any belongings before exiting
the train.

56606.「次は～ グレン城～ グレン城～。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のないよう\n お:
Next stop, Glen Castle. Please make sure not
to leave any belongings before exiting the
train.

56607.「次は～ ガートラント城～ ガートラント城～。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のない:
Next stop, Gartlant Castle. Please make sure
not to leave any belongings before exiting
the train.

56608.「次は～ 娯楽島ラッカラン～ ラッカラン～。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のないよ:
Next stop, Luckland Island. Please make sure
not to leave any belongings before exiting
the train.

56609.「次は～ 港町レンドア～ レンドア～。\n お降りの際は お忘れ物のないよう\n:
Next stop, Port Town Lendor. Please make sure
not to leave any belongings before exiting
the train.

56610.「頼んだぞ！ 浄化のハーブを <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0>個じゃ。\n そ:
Okay, one more time! I need <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Purifying
Herbs! When you've got them, meet me here on
the train again.

56611.「うっうっ……。アズラン駅で\n 名物 カムシカせんべえを買いたかったが\n そ:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Azlantelope
Wafers at Azlan Stop, but I don't think I'll
have time.

56612.「うっうっ……。王都カミハルムイ駅で\n 名物 王都の桜もちを買いたかったが\n:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Royal
Cherry Mochi at the Kamiharmui station, but I
don't think I'll have time now.

56613.「うっうっ……。岳都ガタラ駅で\n 名物 ガタラのブタまんを買いたかったが\n:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Gatara Pig
Buns at the Gatara station, but it looks
like I won't have time now...

56614.「うっうっ……。ドルワーム王国駅で\n 名物 銘菓 砂漠の月を買いたかったが\n:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Moon Desert
Dessert at Dolworm Kingdom's station, but it
looks like I won't have time now.

56615.「うっうっ……。オルフェア駅で\n 名物 アクロバットケーキを買いたかったが\n:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Acrobatic
Cake at Orphea's station, but it looks like I
won't have time now.

56616.「うっうっ……。メギストリスの都駅で\n 名物 メギス鶏のからあげを買いたかった:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Megis Fried
Chicken at Megistris' station, but I don't
think I'll have time now.

56617.「うっうっ……。ジュレット駅で\n 名物 とこなつココナッツを買いたかったが\n:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Summer
Coconut at Julet's station, but it looks
like I won't have time for that now.

56618.「うっうっ……。ヴェリナード城駅で\n 名物 女王様サブレを買いたかったが\n:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Queen
Biscuit at Verinard's station, but it looks
like I won't have time.

56619.「うっうっ……。グレン城下町駅で\n 名物 げんこつアメを買いたかったが\n そ:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Fisticandy
at Glen's station, but it looks like I won't
have time for that now.

56620.「うっうっ……。ガートラント城駅で\n 名物 オーガニックサラダを買いたかったが:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Ogre-nic
Salad at Gartlant's station, but it looks like
I won't have time for that now.

56621.「うっうっ……。娯楽島ラッカラン駅で\n 名物 コロシアムバーガーを買いたかった:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Coliseum
Burger at Luckland's station, but it looks
like I won't have time for that now.

56622.「うっうっ……。港町レンドア駅で\n 名物 グランドタイタス丼を買いたかったが\:
Ugh... I wanted ta' buy the famous Grand Titus
Bowl at Lendor's station, but it looks like
I won't have time for that.

56623.「そ…そうじゃ！ ルシェンダさまには まだ\n わしと会えていないことに してお:
R.. right! Make sure you tell Lushenda you
haven't run into me yet! Dang... gotta hurry!

56624.「おおっ <pc>ではないか！\n 頼んでおいた 浄化のハーブを\n 持ってきて:
Well, if it isn't <pc>!
I see ya' brought me those herbs I asked
ya' for!

56625.賢者ホーローに\n浄化のハーブを 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Give Sage Hollow the Purifying Herbs?<yesno><close>

56626.「ぐぬぬ！ なぜ そんな意地悪を言う？\n わしの賢者生命の ピンチじゃ！\n:
Nooo! Ya' can't do me like that! My reputation
as a sage is on the line here! Please! I
need those herbs!

56627.<pc>は 賢者ホーローに\n浄化のハーブを 渡した！:
<pc> gave Sage Hollow the
Purifying Herbs!

56628.「た…助かった！ 感謝するぞ <pc>。\n さっそく この浄化のハーブを使って:
Ya' really saved me there, <pc>!
Now I can use these Purifying Herbs ta' finish
me new elixir!

56629.「……わしの研究では 調合を重ねた この薬に\n 浄化のハーブを ワイルドかつ\:
Me research has led me to conclude that all
this elixir needs to be perfect are some
wild, yet sensitive Purifying Herbs!

56630.「……おおおっ！？ いい仕上がりじゃぞ！\n あとは 今 仕上がった新しい秘薬を:
Ooooh!! It turned out great! Now just ta'
sprinkle these with this new elixir, and
we'll be all set!

56631.「で……できたぞ！ <pc>。\n この ホーローの研究成果を\n ルシェンダさ:
Aaand.... done! Please take these research
results to Lushenda!

56633.「ふうっ。研究が完成して ひと安心じゃわい。\n ……それはそうと ルシェンダさ:
Phew. It's a relief ta' know my research is
complete.... anyways, I went ahead and read
the rest of Lushenda's letter.

56634.「偽りの世界に落ちた アンルシア姫を\n この世界へ 救いだしたとは……\n さ:
Ya' did an outstandin' job rescuin' Anlucia
from the false Lendersia. Ya' never cease to
amaze me!

56635.「グランゼドーラ王国の現状も 把握した。\n 他の賢者たちには わしから伝えてお:
I also know what's goin' on in Gran Zedora
right now. I'll be sure ta' let the other
sages know.

56636.「次は～ アズラン～ アズラン～。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くなっております:
Next stop, Azlan. The space between the car
and the platform is wide. Please watch your
step.

56637.「次は～ 王都カミハルムイ～ カミハルムイ～。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くな:
Next stop, Royal City Kamiharumui. The
space between the car and the platform is
wide. Please watch your step.

56638.「次は～ 岳都ガタラ～ ガタラ～。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くなっております:
Next stop, Mount Gatara. The space
between the car and the platform is wide.
Please watch your step.

Next stop, Dolworm Kingdom. The space
between the car and the platform is wide.
Please watch your step.

56640.「次は～ オルフェア～ オルフェア～。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くなっており:
Next stop, Orphea. The space between the
car and the platform is wide. Please watch
your step.

56641.「次は～ メギストリスの都 メギストリスの都。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くな:
Next stop, City of Megistris. The space
between the car and the platform is wide.
Please watch your step.

56642.「次は～ ジュレット～ ジュレット～。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くなっており:
Next stop, Julet. The space between the car
and the platform is wide. Please watch your
step.

56643.「次は～ ヴェリナード城～ ヴェリナード城～。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くな:
Next stop, Verinard Castle. The space
between the car and the platform is wide.
Please watch your step.

56644.「次は～ グレン城～ グレン城～。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くなっております:
Next stop, Glen Castle. The space between
the car and the platform is wide. Please
watch your step.

56645.「次は～ ガートラント城～ ガートラント城～。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くな:
Next stop, Gartlant Castle. The space
between the car and the platform is wide.
Please watch your step.

56646.「次は～ 娯楽島ラッカラン～ ラッカラン～。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くなっ:
Next stop, Luckland Island. The space
between the car and the platform is wide.
Please watch your step.

56647.「次は～ 港町レンドア～ レンドア～。\n 車両と ホームの間が 広くなっており:
Next stop, Port Town Lendor. The space
between the car and the platform is wide.
Please watch your step.

56648.「おお。もう着いたか……。\n くれぐれも 賢者ルシェンダさまには\n 失礼のな:
Aye, here's yer' stop. But make sure
ta' treat Lushenda with the utmost courtesy
and respect.

56649.「いかん！ 今日こそは アズラン駅で\n 名物 カムシカせんべえを買うんじゃった:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta' buy
those famous Azlantelope Wafers at the Azlan
station. Gotta go!

56650.「いかん！ 今日こそは 王都カミハルムイ駅で\n 名物 王都の桜もちを買うんじゃ:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta'
buy that famous Royal Cherry Mochi at
the Kamiharmui station. Gotta go!

56651.「いかん！ 今日こそは 岳都ガタラ駅で\n 名物 ガタラのブタまんを買うんじゃっ:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta'
buy those famous Gatara Pig Buns at
the Gatara station. Gotta go!

56652.「いかん！ 今日こそは ドルワーム王国駅で\n 名物 銘菓 砂漠の月を買うんじゃ:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta' buy
that famous Moon Desert Dessert at the Dolworm
station. Gotta go!

56653.「いかん！ 今日こそは オルフェア駅で\n 名物 アクロバットケーキを買うんじゃ:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta'
buy that famous Acrobatic Cake at
the Orphea station. Gotta go!

56654.「いかん！ 今日こそは メギストリスの都駅で\n 名物 メギス鶏のからあげを買う:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta'
buy that famous Megi Fried Chicken at
the Megistris station. Gotta go!

56655.「いかん！ 今日こそは ジュレット駅で\n 名物 とこなつココナッツを買うんじゃ:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta'
buy that famous Summer Coconut at
the Julet station. Gotta go!

56656.「いかん！ 今日こそは ヴェリナード城駅で\n 名物 女王様サブレを買うんじゃっ:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta'
buy that famous Queen Biscuit at
the Verinard station. Gotta go!

56657.「いかん！ 今日こそは グレン城下町駅で\n 名物 げんこつアメを買うんじゃった:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta'
buy that famous Fisticandy at
the Glen station. Gotta go!

56658.「いかん！ 今日こそは ガートラント城駅で\n 名物 オーガニックサラダを買うん:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta' buy
that famous Ogre-nic Salad at the Gartlant
station. Gotta go!

56659.「いかん！ 今日こそは 娯楽島ラッカラン駅で\n 名物 コロシアムバーガーを買う:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta'
buy that famous Coliseum Burger at
the Luckland station. Gotta go!

56660.「いかん！ 今日こそは 港町レンドア駅で\n 名物 グランドタイタス丼を買うんじ:
Shoot! Today's the day I was supposed ta'
buy that famous Grand Titus Bowl at
the Lendor station. Gotta go!

56661.「では 今日のところは お別れじゃ。\n 運命の線路が交差するとき また会おう！:
Well, I bid ya' adieu fer' today, <if_woman>lassie<else>laddie<endif>. See
ya' again when the tracks of destiny
cross!

56663.「うん。うまい！\n 作りたての味が しっかり保持されておる！:
Wow, delicious! It's so fresh, and the
flavor has been well preserved!

56664.「これなら たとえ 数年経った料理でも\n できたてと変わらぬ味で\n おいしく:
With this, even food that is years old will
still taste the same as when it was first
prepared.

56665.「……まったく ホーローのヤツめ。\n これほどの技を 持っているのに\n 追い:
Hollow, you old bean. You do have the skill,
but you can't do it unless you're backed into
a corner... how pathetic.

56666.「きっと 今回も あわてて\n <pc>に手伝ってくれるよう\n 泣きついたこと:
I'm more than certain he rushed to you for
help, didn't he...

56667.「だが これだけの成果を上げれば 上出来だ。\n この料理に使われている秘薬を:
But if this is what came out of it, he's done
well. I'm sure chefs around the world will be
delighted to hear about this new elixir.

56668.「うん？ ホーローの使命に関わるという研究が\n こんなに 地味なものだったとは:
Hm? That look on your face says "I didn't
realize the results of Hollow's research
would be so modest."

56669.「人々の生活のために\n その叡智を役立てるのも 賢者の務めなのだぞ。:
It's a sage's duty to use their wisdom for the
good of all people.

56670.「……とはいえ これから しばらくは\n その叡智を 大魔王マデサゴーラとの\n:
...However, for the foreseeable future, we
must now gather our wisdom for the coming
battle against Madesagora.

56671.「我らは そうして歴史の陰から\n 世界を支えてきた 善なる知識の守護者……:
Thus, we are the guardians who use
knowledge for good, to sustain the world
from the shadows of history...

56672.「叡智の冠なのだから。: That is the Crown of Wisdom.

56673.「……今回のはたらき ご苦労であったな。\n 私の見込んだ通り やはり そなたは:
I very much appreciate the work you've done
here. Just I had hoped, you convinced me that
you are worthy of my trust.

56674.「これからも 協力を頼むぞ。<pc>。\n これは ホーローに手紙を届け 研究成:
Keep up the great work. I'd like to give you
this as thanks for delivering the letter and
bringing back Hollow's results.

56675.「引き続き レンダーシアの調査を進めてくれ！\n 旅をして出会った人々に チカラ:
Keep up your investigate of Lendersia! Keep
traveling and helping those in need, and you
certainly discover the world's mysteries.
